text: My friend Gene sings in a Bowie cover band that’s opening up for a 14-piece Michael Jackson tribute group. Sadly I’ll be unable to attend but I have a feeling this is going to be amazing: <https://www.ticketfly.com/purchase/event/1000387?_ga=1.179672164.1596990215.1407516285>

attachments.text: Get tickets to Foreverland - 14-piece Tribute to Michael Jackson at Doug Fir Lounge, Portland, OR on 01/08/16
